snippet.title: Puzzle Tactics Trailer
snippet.description: Puzzle Tactics is a turn-based and grid-based tactics game played in various small levels. You play as the blue team with the goal of defeating the red team's units before losing your own. Later levels are more difficult and introduce more unit types in battle. The game is controlled using the mouse.
